analysis.situation_summary: T-side player with low health (38 HP) holding dual pistols in Mirage connector area, full team alive against full CT team
immediate_threats: Low health makes player vulnerable to any engagement
Multiple potential angles for CT rotations
opportunities: Full team still alive for coordinated execute
Good weapon loadout with AK backup
Central map position for information gathering

advice.primary_action: Switch to AK-47 immediately and find cover behind the wall or pillar
advice.reasoning: With only 38 HP, any hit will likely be fatal. Dual pistols are inferior for medium-long range duels that are common in connector. The AK provides much better damage output and range
advice.fallback: If enemies push connector, fall back toward T-spawn or palace while maintaining crossfire with teammates
advice.callout: Call connector clear for now but request backup due to low health - avoid solo duels
